text: The 2015 Philippine Basketball Association (PBA) Commissioner's Cup Finals was the best-of-seven championship series of the 2015 PBA Commissioner's Cup, and the conclusion of the conference's playoffs. Rain or Shine and Talk 'N Text competed for the 15th Commissioner's Cup championship and the 114th overall championship contested by the league. ==Background== ===Road to the finals=== {|class=wikitable style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=2 width=45%| Talk 'N Text !! colspan=2 width=45%| Rain or Shine |- | Finished 8–3 (0.727)—Tied with Purefoods and Rain or Shine at 1st place ||colspan=2|Elimination round || Finished 8–3 (0.727)—Tied with Purefoods and Talk 'N Text at 1st place |- | 1.010 (2nd place) ||colspan=2|Tiebreaker* || 1.025 (1st place) |- | Def. Barako Bull, 127–97 (twice-to-beat advantage) ||colspan=2|Quarterfinals || Def. Barangay Ginebra, 92–91 (twice-to-beat advantage) |- | Def. Purefoods Star, 3–1 (best-of-five) ||colspan=2|Semifinals|| Def. Meralco, 3–0 (best-of- five) |} ===Head-to-head matchup=== ==Series summary== {| border=1 cellspacing=0 width=525 align=center |- style="text-align:center; background- color:#e6e6e6;" !align=center width=30%|Team !width=8%|Game 1 !width=8%|Game 2 !width=8%|Game 3 !width=8%|Game 4 !width=8%|Game 5 !width=8%|Game 6 !width=8%|Game 7** !width=8%|Wins |- style="text-align:center;" |align=left|Talk 'N Text | 99 || 108 || 97 || 99 || 103 || 93 || 121 || 4 |- style="text-align:center;" |align=left|Rain or Shine | 92 || 116 || 109 || 92 || 94 || 101 || 119 || 3 |- style="text-align:center; font-size: 85%; background-color:#e6e6e6;" |align=left|Venue | MOA || Araneta || Araneta || Araneta || Araneta || Araneta || Araneta || |}*number of overtimes ===Game 1=== ===Game 2=== ===Game 3=== ===Game 4=== ===Game 5=== ===Game 6=== ===Game 7=== ==Rosters== {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%; width: 100%;" |- ! colspan="2" style="background-color: #; color: #; text-align: center;" | Talk 'N Text Tropang Texters 2015 Commissioner's Cup roster |- style="background-color:#; color: #; text-align: center;" !
